exec: pm.test("Verify Response status code is 200", function () {
pm.test("Verify Response has the required fields - name, email, createdAt, and updatedAt", function () {
pm.test("Verify Name and email is non-empty strings", function () {
pm.test("Email is in a valid email format", function () {
pm.test("Verify Response status code is 200", function () {
pm.test("Verify Response has the required fields - isSuccessful, statusCode, message, data", function () {
pm.test("Validate the data object schema - token, user", function () {
pm.test("Verify Email in the user object is in a valid format", function () {
pm.test("Verify Response status code is 201", function () {
pm.test("Verify Response has the required fields", function () {
pm.test("Product details have the required fields", function () {
pm.test("Verify Response status code is 200", function () {
pm.test("Validate the 'isSuccessful' field in the response schema", function () {
pm.test("Verify StatusCode field exists in the response schema", function () {
pm.test("Verify Message field exists in the response schema", function () {
pm.test("Verify Data array is present and contains expected fields and data types", function () {
